title: DataCategory
description: High-Level description of the personal data processed that encompasses one or several data types. Ex : the data category "identity" can encompass several data types such as first name, last name, birthdate etc.

name.description: ex : identity, connection data, lifestyle etc.

isSensitive.description: Specifies whether the dataCategory contains sensitive data

sensitiveLegalBasis.description: Description of the legal basis of the sensitive data processing according to art. 9 and 10 GDPR

dataTypes.description: Description of the DataTypes related to the dataCategory

dataSubjectCategories.description: The categories of individuals whose personal data is processed (ex : employees, prospects, clients)
